>Also, without intending to start a philosophical/religious debate=
,
>I was humbly wondering why TestCase::run() creates a TestResult,
>passes=
 it to the run(TestResult) method which then turns the tables
>on TestResul=
t and asks it to run the TestCase at which point the
>TestResult does the a=
ctual runBare() stuff? To my incredibly small
>brain, it's difficult to und=
erstand why a TestResult should know

Check ou=
t junit.extensions.TestSetup. That will show you the motivation for refacto=
ring to Protectable. Perhaps it is not the best name, but I cannot think of=
 a better one.
